name: Unwanded & Unwanted
description:
RECOMMENDED TO PLAY IN FULLSCREEN

Game is in prototype state, created for brackeys game jam. 

Controls:

Jump:  "Space"

Long Jump: hold "Space"

Directions:  "A/D"

Long/Momentum Slide: hold "A/D+Space"

Throttle:  Press Opposite direction right before you land after the jump

Story: Wizard got new, shiny dark crystal for his wand so his old,  standard - "exists in every lore type" blue crystal wasn't wanted anymore. during removal process big chunk of it was shattered in a big explosion (which also killed stupid, greedy wizard. serves him right!) and got spread all around the dungeons. Now you must take control of blue crystal which can't even walk because... well because crystals don't have legs duh!!! (and it's totally not developer trying to reduce his workload by removing movement out of the calculation!!!) anyway, you take control of this nonwalking, legless blue crystal  on the quest of roaming trough dungeons filled with ancient wormholes and gathering shattered pieces to restore its magic to former glory. 

p.s. well, atleast you can slide!
